title: Recueïl de Lions: Dessinés d'apres nature par divers maitres et gravés par B. Picart (Collection of Lions: Drawn from nature by various masters and engraved by B. Picart)
medium: bound volume with 1 etched title, 1 engraved vignette on printed title, and 42 etched illustrations on 36 leaves of laid paper (30 full-page plates and 12 printed 2 etchings per page on 6 leaves)
attribution: Bernard Picart with plates after  Albrecht Dürer, after Charles Le Brun and after Rembrandt van Rijn
creditline: Katharine Shepard Fund and Ailsa Mellon Bruce Fund
